4 namespace PDFxTMD
5 {
6 template <typename Derived, typename Reader, typename... ExtrapolateArgs>
7 class IExtrapolator : public CRTPBase<Derived>
8 {
9  public:
10  double extrapolate(const IReader<Reader> *reader, ExtrapolateArgs... args) const
11  {
12  return this->derived().extrapolate(reader, args...);
13  }
14 };
15 
16 template <typename Derived, typename Reader, typename Interpolator, typename... ExtrapolateArgs>
17 class IAdvancedExtrapolator : public IExtrapolator<Derived, Reader, ExtrapolateArgs...>
18 {
19  public:
20  void setInterpolator(const Interpolator *interpolator)
21  {
22  m_interpolator = interpolator;
23  }
24 
25  protected:
26  const Interpolator *m_interpolator{nullptr};
27 };

31 {
32 };
